data.text: @Sandrovelio @MayorBowser So you don’t want the CDC to tell you what to do with your kids, don’t tell me what to do with mine.
@MayorBowser The CDC Covid -19 Level for DC is now Low which allows for mask measures to be lifted. Please remove the mask mandate in DC Schools.
@MayorBowser Infecting people with a jab? Bill Gates: Sadly the virus itself particularly the variant called Omicron is a type of vaccine https://t.co/6lfombNnXD
@MayorBowser 21-Year-Old Med Student Severely Injured by Pfizer Vaccine Still Waiting for Response From Government Compensation Program https://t.co/7qxR6p87Sg
@MayorBowser CDC says to unmask the kids! Do it NOW!
